content.raw: Interesting, the reason I had removed them was to prevent the creation of new unique materials every time. Then after I changed it I didn't try any Ogre 1 worlds. It may be better to fix the underlying issue on `ign-rendering` so Ogre 1 works the same way as Ogre 2.
content.html: Interesting, the reason I had removed them was to prevent the creation of new unique materials every time. Then after I changed it I didn't try any Ogre 1 worlds. It may be better to fix the underlying issue on ign-rendering so Ogre 1 works the same way as Ogre 2.
